title: Resistance - current with 2x area and same length

content.question: A wire connected to a battery carries a current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>I</mi></math>. A second wire of the same length and twice the cross-sectional area of the first wire is made from the same material. What is the current in the second wire when it is connected to the same battery?

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
